name: Planet Buster (itch)
description:
Fly your ship on a mission to destroy all the planets in the solar system. This is easier said than done - each planet has its own weapons ready to fire back, and a field of orbiting debris you'll need to chip through before you can damage the planet itself.

TIP: LET GO OF THE SHOOT BUTTON TO MOVE FASTER

This game was made for LOWREZJAM 2022, using The Sun Is Your Enemy as a theme.

Controls ActionKeySelect (Menu)Left/RightConfirm (Menu)SpaceMoveLeft/RightShoot (you move slower while shooting)SpaceExit LevelEscape Credits
  • Engine: GameMaker Studio 2
  • Sound FX: jfxr
  • Music: BeepBox
  • Font: Teeny Tiny Pixls by Chequered Ink
